title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 105.3 - Field inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 105.3 - Field inspections

State Regulations
(a) There will be at least two field inspections, the first of which shall be
before the first picking. Fields are subject to inspection at any time without
notice to the grower. (b) The guide
in making inspections for general conformity to type of the variety named shall
be an official description obtained from originator of the variety and on file
in the office of the certification agency, or a description in any accepted
standard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
105.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
